name: Ulfar
text:
When maintaining the balance, it's ashes to ashes, drust to drust.

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: Snow Bell
text:
Ring in the new season in style!

Acquired by winning 5 games in ranked mode, December 2023.

name: Lana'thel
text:
This sinister yet elegant style is in her blood.

Obtainable by purchasing in the shop.

name: Rumble
text:
There are no grumbles from these rumbles!

Acquired from participating in an authorized promotion.

name: Blizzard For All 2023
text:
Gratitude to all our players, old and new!

Acquired by participating in Hearthstone events during 2023.

name: Badlands
text: For all the rootin' tootin' lootin' shootin' highfalutin outlaws out there. Earnable on the Showdown in the Badlands reward track.
